name: Ruben Tagalog
description: '''Ruben Tagalog''' (October 17, 1922 â€“ March 5, 1985) was a Filipino [[actor]] and [[musician]], famous for his works in the [[kundiman]] style. He was also one of the founders of the singing group [[Mabuhay Singers]]. He is known as the "Father of Kundiman". He was a member of the US Army during the [[Japanese occupation of the Philippines]].
